name: Defense Evasion - User Activity Based Checks (T1497.002)
description: Detects attempts to detect sandbox environments based on user interaction indicators such as mouse movement, keyboard input, or UI events.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.args:(*GetAsyncKeyState* OR *GetCursorPos* OR *mouse_event* OR *user32.dll* OR *SendInput* OR *keyboard* OR *idle time*)
